title: Security Management
headline: This free online course teaches how security management works, what functions it has and what risks it poses.
description: This course introduces us to the essential functions and role of safety management. We will examine the organisational structure of safety management and the organisational principles. We will then learn about crucial functions that protect an organisation from all types of risks, threats and fraud. Then, we will explore the importance of physical security and the role of information security protection in organisations.
courseDescription:
In this course, ‘Security Management’, we will learn in detail the principles, functions and policies of security management. We will examine the security of nation-states and international systems. Are you wondering what the basic functions of security management are in any organisation? In this course, we will cover this in detail. We will look at the organisational structure of security management and principles, including the difference between corporate and enterprise security. The course also explains personal security and how you can use private security specialists to mitigate high-level risks.

Then we will demonstrate the importance of physical and information security in organisations. Are you wondering how we can protect an organisation from all types of risks, threats and fraud? This course will explain the essential functions of physical and information security in institutions. We will look at the operations and fundamentals of organisational resilience, including crisis management. We will examine the security manager's and their team's function in effectively performing their duties. In addition, we will explore the concept of crisis and its different phases. We will also learn about the importance of cybersecurity and fraud prevention and the role of the security management team in these processes. We will investigate common types of fraud and fraud prevention techniques. 

Next, we will analyse how we should conduct security investigations in various organisations, including core business alignment. Then, we will take an in-depth look at compliance and counterintelligence investigations. We will research the legal implications of security misuse and explore the importance of security regulation and its relationship to law enforcement. Finally, we will study the functions and roles of the EU’s General Data Protection Regulation and the Security Authority Licence. This course is ideal for anyone who wants to learn about security management and reduce the risks of fraud and threats in an organisation. So why wait? Start your learning journey today.
